title: SatyaSh - SatyaShell
aboutGreeting: Salutations! My name is Satya Ananda, and you can reach me out on my socials. I am a final year Computer Engineering student from Universitas Indonesia with interest in software engineering, internet of things, big data, and cybersecurity. My hobbies are music writing, music production, novel writing, watching movies, and playing video games. Currently seeking internship opportunities to contribute in industry-level projects to grow my soft and hard skills.

description: Led the productivity improvement project of CSIRT (incident response team) by automation, visualization, and SOP provision
Developed using Power Apps, Power BI, Power Automate, and Microsoft Teams.
Pilot cybersecurity platform (PoC) for suppliers' compliancy with JAMA/JAPIA cybersecurity standard using Power Apps and Power Automate in Microsoft Teams environment.
Became evidence PIC during ISO/IEC 27001:2013 surveillance audit.
Assisted Linear Algebra course in grading 40 students' assignments.

Responsible for frontend (Flutter), API management, and project management as team leader.
